summary: Adrian Sotomayor is identified as the father of Manuel Marti. Records indicate that Adrian Sotomayor changed his name to Manuel Marti in 1963. FBI reports concerning Adrian Sotomayor date back to 1953. The documents suggest that information about Adrian Sotomayor is relevant to investigations concerning his son, Manuel Marti. The 108th Military Intelligence Group (I-SIB) prepared a document referencing ten FBI reports regarding Adrian Sotomayor.
significance: Adrian Sotomayor's significance in the JFK context stems from his connection to Manuel Marti and the fact that FBI reports concerning him are being reviewed in relation to investigations involving his son. The name change and the existence of multiple FBI reports suggest a potential area of interest for investigators.
